overview: In 2010 two surfers travel 30,000 kilometers down the west coast of Africa. Along the way, they surfed in Morocco, West Sahara, Senegal, Siberia, Angola, Namibia, and South Africa. Thirty Thousand Documents a beautiful portrayal of the wonderfully rich culture, untouched waves, and the amazing people of Africa, and combines it all to tell a beautiful story of a surf journey.
title: Thirty Thousand
